description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.MIU01ulGZhgncs2N]{Career Trooper}

You know that a colony’s survival means that each colonist look out for everyone else in times of hardship or privation. When you successfully use the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA]{Survival} skill to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA#endure-severe-weather]{endure severe weather} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA#live-off-the-land]{live off the land}, increase the number of other creatures you can grant saving throw bonuses or sustenance to by an amount equal to half your level. You can give another creature any benefit that you would gain from a Survival check to endure severe weather or live off the land (such as a bonus to Fortitude saves or sustenance you would gain), but if you do, you don’t gain it for yourself.
